channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NH
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for NH

item.title: Report X-2023100983
item.description:
Report X-2023100983

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-16T18:13:10+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-04
  • City: LONDONDERRY
  • State: NH
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was found leaking and smoking on truck. Package was removed and placed in hazardous bin and brought directly to Hazmat Caged area. Ventilation fan was turned on and 2 employees handled the package with PPE to ensure leaking stopped. Package was flipped upright and bottle caps were twisted on tight. DescribePack: One bottle was found with loosened cap from transit. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was removed immediately and handled immediately. Further leaking was also prevented immediately upon discovery.

item.title: Report X-2023100950
item.description:
Report X-2023100950

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-15T15:11:35+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-05
  • City: WEST CHESTERFIELD
  • State: NH
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The trailer was being unloaded, when they saw 3 hazmats in the belly of the trailer on there sides and one had lost it's cover and the contents leaked out onto the floor of the trailer soaking a lot of packages. The leaking hazmat was put into a yellow salvage drum and absorbant material was used to contain the spill. The packages were removed and repacked. A call was made to find out how to handle the Corrosive (saftey of the employees) DescribePack: the cover came off when it fell on its side DurationRel: 3 and MitigateEffect: absorbant materials were used to absorb the liquid
